block.p: Pages 40 and 42 of Arts & Leisure, carrying arts listings, were omitted from some copies in the New York region on Sunday and replaced by pages from a special E-Commerce section scheduled for tomorrow. Readers wishing replacement pages may write to Production Quality Control, The New York Times, 229 West 43rd Street, New York, N.Y. 10036, or telephone (212) 556-1992. E-mail: quality@nytimes.com. (Include a postal return address.)

Readers wishing replacement pages may write to Production Quality Control, The New York Times, 229 West 43rd Street, New York, N.Y. 10036, or telephone (212) 556-1992. E-mail: quality@nytimes.com. (Include a postal return address.)
